data.title: Lady Gaga's "Born This Way" Revenge app on iPhones now
data.meta_description: Little monsters, rejoice! Disney's Tapulous just launched a new music-tapping game for the iPhone and iPod Touch
data.text:
(CBS) - Little monsters, rejoice! Disney's Tapulous just launched Lady Gaga's "Born This Way" Revenge, a music-tapping game for the iPhone and iPod Touch.

The game will set you back $4.99, but provides minutes of pleasure (or perhaps hours if you've got a lot of time on your hands). All players have to do is tap the touchscreen in tandem with the rhythm of the song as little triangles speed across. Sounds like mindless fun to us!

Although Tapulous has already created other Lady Gaga games, this is the first one with social features, like the ability to connect to Gaga's Facebook page and Twitter feed, chat with fellow fans, get lyrics, find Gaga-related events, and receive updates on other Gaga games.

Lady Gaga sure knows how to keep in touch with fans. No wonder she beat Oprah Winfrey on Forbes' "Most Powerful Celebrities" list!

Are you going to tap to Lady Gaga?
